Detailed Description

The serialization converter allows for customization of the serialization process.

Member Function Documentation

abstract bool FullSerializer.fsConverter.CanProcess ( Type  type)
pure virtual

Can this converter serialize and deserialize the given object type?

Parameters
typeThe given object type.
Returns
True if the converter can serialize it, false otherwise.

virtual object FullSerializer.fsConverter.CreateInstance ( fsData  data,
Type  storageType 
)
virtual

Construct an object instance that will be passed to TryDeserialize. This should not deserialize the object.

Parameters
dataThe data the object was serialized with.
storageTypeThe field/property type that is storing the instance.

virtual bool FullSerializer.fsConverter.RequestCycleSupport ( Type  storageType)
virtual

If true, then the serializer will support cyclic references with the given converted type.

Parameters
storageTypeThe field/property type that is currently storing the object that is being serialized.

Reimplemented in FullSerializer.Internal.fsIEnumerableConverter, FullInspector.Serializers.FullSerializer.UnityObjectConverter, FullSerializer.Internal.fsEnumConverter, FullSerializer.Internal.fsKeyValuePairConverter, FullSerializer.Internal.fsArrayConverter, FullSerializer.Internal.fsGuidConverter, FullSerializer.Internal.fsPrimitiveConverter, and FullSerializer.Internal.fsTypeConverter.

virtual bool FullSerializer.fsConverter.RequestInheritanceSupport ( Type  storageType)
virtual

If true, then the serializer will include inheritance data for the given converter.

Parameters
